ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt:
ï»¿OEMUMENMh-I RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Credit and Grant for a Skills Development and Youth Employment Project to the Republic of Mali The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to Republic of Mali a Credit and Grant in an amount equivalent to SDR 23,300,000 and SDR 17,400,000 respectively. The purpose of said credit and grant is to support education and training for employability and private-sector led job opportunities for youth in the Republic of Mali. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to provide such Credit and Grant, and of the purpose(s) to which the proceeds of the credit and Grant are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project for which the proceeds of such Credit and Grant are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of Republic of Mali and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of Republic of Mali. 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said project for such assistance.
ï»¿Republic ofMali - 2 - Skills Development and Youth Employment Project COMMITTEE Se r Vice President and Group ral Counsel ee selected by Governor for the Republic of Mali egional Vice President Africa Region Dated at Washington, D.C.
